11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Wahb Al-Jaishani narrated that:He heard Ibn Fairuz Ad-Dhailami narrating from his father: "I went to the Prophet and said: 'O Messenger of Allah! I accepted Islam and I had two sisters (as wives).' So the Messenger of Allah said: 'Chose whichever of them you will

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يُسْلِمُ وَعِنْدَهُ أُخْتَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Accepts Islam While He Is Married To Two Sisters
